to sell more than a half million company shares throughout the year as part of his asset-diversification plan, his first such sale in more than three years,'' Steve Jobs Russolillo reports for Dow Jones Newswires. The sales, worth about$ 335 million based on Google's closing price Thursday, will lower Eric Schmidt 's stake and voting power, and comes as Google announced that co-founder Larry Page will replace Eric Schmidt as chief executive. Eric Schmidt will become executive chairman in April, Russolillo reports.`` The stock-trading plan, unveiled in a filing with the Securities and Exchange Commission, said Eric Schmidt intends to sell as much as 534,000 Class A shares during the course of the year.
